alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:59PM CDT until June 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SHERMAN COUNTY... At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Sunray, or 14 miles northeast of Dumas, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Sherman County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75IN
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
